Name: Brands
Description: The brands this record is assigned to.

Name: Company
Description: Name of the associated company if present.

Name: Is Target Account
Description: Associated company's status about being marketed or sold to.

Name: Company Last Engagement Date
Description: The last time a contact engaged with your site or a form, document, meetings link, or tracked email. This doesn't include marketing emails or emails to multiple contacts.

Name: Company Last Engagement Type
Description: The type of the last engagement a company performed. This doesn't include marketing emails or emails to multiple contacts.
Options: Company Website Visit (COMPANYPROSPECTS_REVISIT); Document View (PRESENTATION_REVISIT); Email Click (EMAIL_CLICK); Email Open (EMAIL_OPEN); Email Reply (EMAIL_REPLY); Form Submitted (FORM_SUBMITTED); Meeting Booked (MEETING_BOOKED); Website Visit (HUBSPOT_REVISIT)

Name: Company Time of Last Session
Description: Time of the last session attributed to any contacts that are associated with this lead's primary company

Name: Company Next Activity Date
Description: The date of the next activity, rolled up from the primary associated company.

Name: Company Next Activity Type
Description: The type of the next activity, rolled up from the primary associated company.
Options: Call (CALL); Conversation session (CONVERSATION_SESSION); Email reply from contact (INCOMING_EMAIL); Email sent to contact (EMAIL); Forwarded email (FORWARDED_EMAIL); LinkedIn message (LINKEDIN_MESSAGE); Meeting (MEETING); Note (NOTE); Postal mail (POSTAL_MAIL); Publishing task (PUBLISHING_TASK); SMS; Task (TASK); WhatsApp (WHATS_APP)

Name: Company Number of Pageviews
Description: Total number of page views across all contacts associated with this lead's primary company

Name: Associated company timezone
Description: The associated company's timezone, if present.

Name: Contact Buying Role
Description: Associated contact's role during the sales process.

Name: Associated contact job title
Description: Job title of the associated contact if present.

Name: Contact Last Engagement Date
Description: The last time a contact engaged with your site or a form, document, meetings link, or tracked email. This doesn't include marketing emails or emails to multiple contacts.

Name: Contact Last Engagement Type
Description: The type of the last engagement a contact performed. This doesn't include marketing emails or emails to multiple contacts.
Options: Company Website Visit (COMPANYPROSPECTS_REVISIT); Document View (PRESENTATION_REVISIT); Email Click (EMAIL_CLICK); Email Open (EMAIL_OPEN); Email Reply (EMAIL_REPLY); Form Submitted (FORM_SUBMITTED); Meeting Booked (MEETING_BOOKED); Website Visit (HUBSPOT_REVISIT)

Name: Contact Time of Last Session
Description: Timestamp for start of the most recent session for this lead's primary contact to your website.

Name: Contact Next Activity Date
Description: The date of the next activity, rolled up from the primary associated contact.

Name: Contact Next Activity Type
Description: The type of the next activity, rolled up from the primary associated contact.
Options: Call (CALL); Conversation session (CONVERSATION_SESSION); Email reply from contact (INCOMING_EMAIL); Email sent to contact (EMAIL); Forwarded email (FORWARDED_EMAIL); LinkedIn message (LINKEDIN_MESSAGE); Meeting (MEETING); Note (NOTE); Postal mail (POSTAL_MAIL); Publishing task (PUBLISHING_TASK); SMS; Task (TASK); WhatsApp (WHATS_APP)

Name: Contact Number of Pageviews
Description: Total number of page views this lead's primary contact has had on your website

Name: Associated contact timezone
Description: The associated contact's timezone, if present.

Name: Created by user ID
Description: The user who created this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Object create date/time
Description: The date and time at which this object was created. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

Name: Last Activity Date
Description: The date of the last activity. Defaults to the date of the primary associated contact. If not present, looks to the date of the primary associated company.

Name: Last Engagement Date
Description: If primary contact exists, the last time the contact engaged with your site or a form, document, meetings link, or tracked email. This doesn't include marketing emails or emails to multiple contacts. Otherwise it is the last time for the associated company

Name: Last Engagement Type
Description: If primary contact exists, the type of the last engagement the contact performed. This doesn't include marketing emails or emails to multiple contacts. Otherwise it is the type of the last engagement for the associated company

Name: Lead Time of Last Session
Description: If the associated contact exists, the timestamp for the start of the most recent session for this contact to your website. Otherwise the timestamp for the start of the most recent session for the associated company to your website.

Name: Object last modified date/time
Description: Most recent timestamp of any property update for this object. This includes HubSpot internal properties, which can be visible or hidden. This property is updated automatically.

Name: Associated Deal Pipeline Stage
Description: The pipeline stage of the primary associated deal

Name: Associated deals
Description: Number of associated deals for a given lead.

Name: Call Count
Description: The number of calls made to this lead

Name: Closed won deal amount
Description: The total amount of the lead's associated deals that are closed-won

Name: Message Thread Count
Description: The number of message threads (SMS, LinkedIn, WhatsApp) opened with this lead

Name: Lead Disqualification Note
Description: A note on why the lead was disqualified

Name: Disqualification Reason
Description: Dropdown list of reasons for disqualification
Options: Bad Timing (BAD_TIMING); Budget Constraints (BUDGET_CONSTRAINTS); No Decision-making Power (NO_DECISION_MAKING_POWER); Competitor Preference (COMPETITOR_PREFERENCE); Not a Good Fit (NOT_A_GOOD_FIT); No Interest (NO_INTEREST); Prior Negative Experience (PRIOR_NEGATIVE_EXPERIENCE); Technical Limitations (TECHNICAL_LIMITATIONS)

Name: Email Count
Description: The number of emails sent to this lead

Name: First Outreach Date
Description: The date of the first outreach (call, email, meeting or other communication) from the sales rep to the lead.

Name: Lead flow id
Description: Flow id of the workflow that created this lead

Name: Open leads
Description: Whether the lead's pipeline stage has any category other than `QUALIFIED` or `UNQUALIFIED`

Name: Is Open
Description: Whether the lead's pipeline stage has category "Not started" or "In progress"

Name: Lead Label
Description: Current status of a given lead

Name: Meeting Count
Description: The number of meetings booked with this lead

Name: Lead Name
Description: The full name of the lead.

Name: Outreach activity count
Description: The total number of outreach activities (call, email, meeting or other communication) from the sales rep to the lead.

Name: Open deal amount
Description: The total value of any open deals associated with this lead

Name: Lead Source
Description: The analytics source of the lead, inherited from primary associated contact or company at the time of lead creation
Options: Organic Search (ORGANIC_SEARCH); Paid Search (PAID_SEARCH); Email Marketing (EMAIL_MARKETING); Organic Social (SOCIAL_MEDIA); Referrals (REFERRALS); Other Campaigns (OTHER_CAMPAIGNS); Direct Traffic (DIRECT_TRAFFIC); Offline Sources (OFFLINE); Paid Social (PAID_SOCIAL)

Name: Initial company lifecycle stage
Description: The first detected lifecycle stage on a company associated with the lead as that lead's primary company. Not updated after initial value set.

Name: Initial contact lifecycle stage
Description: The first detected lifecycle stage on a contact associated with the lead as that lead's primary contact. Not updated after initial value set.

Name: Initial source lifecycle stage
Description: The lifecycle stage of the primary associated contact or company at the time of lead creation

Name: Time to First Touch
Description: Time between lead creation and first outreach activity

Name: Lead Type
Description: The type of lead. By default, categorize your lead as either a New Business, Existing Business, or Re-attempting

Name: Merged record IDs
Description: The list of record IDs that have been merged into this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Next Activity Date
Description: The date of the next activity. Defaults to the date of the primary associated contact. If not present, looks to the date of the primary associated company.

Name: Next Activity Type
Description: The type of the next activity. Defaults to the type of the primary associated contact. If not present, looks to the type of the primary associated company.
Options: Call (CALL); Conversation session (CONVERSATION_SESSION); Email reply from contact (INCOMING_EMAIL); Email sent to contact (EMAIL); Forwarded email (FORWARDED_EMAIL); LinkedIn message (LINKEDIN_MESSAGE); Meeting (MEETING); Note (NOTE); Postal mail (POSTAL_MAIL); Publishing task (PUBLISHING_TASK); SMS; Task (TASK); WhatsApp (WHATS_APP)

Name: Lead Number of Pageviews
Description: Number of pageviews for the associated contact if it exists. Otherwise the number of pageviews for the associated company.

Name: Record ID
Description: The unique ID for this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Record source detail 1
Description: First level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 2
Description: Second level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 3
Description: Third level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source
Description: How this record was created.

Name: Lead Pipeline
Description: The pipeline that the lead is in

Name: Pipeline stage category id
Description: The category id assigned to the lead's current pipeline stage

Name: Pipeline stage category
Description: The category assigned to the lead's current pipeline stage
Options: Not started (NEW) [READ-ONLY]; In progress (IN_PROGRESS) [READ-ONLY]; Qualified (QUALIFIED) [READ-ONLY]; Disqualified (UNQUALIFIED) [READ-ONLY]

Name: Primary Associated Object Name
Description: The primary associated contact or company name

Name: Primary Associated Company Object ID
Description: The object ID of the primary associated company

Name: Primary contact enrolled in sequence
Description: Indicates whether the lead's primary contact is currently enrolled in a sequence

Name: Primary Associated Contact Object ID
Description: The object ID of the primary associated contact

Name: Lead tags
Description: List of tag ids applicable to a lead. This property is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Updated by user ID
Description: The user who last updated this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Owner assigned date
Description: The most recent timestamp of when an owner was assigned to this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Lead Owner
Description: Owner of the lead. Defaults to the owner of the primary associated contact. If not present, looks to the owner of the primary associated company.

Name: HubSpot Team
Description: The primary team of the owner.

Name: Cumulative time in "Attempting (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The cumulative time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'Attempting' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Cumulative time in "Connected (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The cumulative time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'Connected' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Cumulative time in "New (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The cumulative time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'New' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Cumulative time in "Qualified (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The cumulative time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'Qualified' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Cumulative time in "Disqualified (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The cumulative time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'Disqualified' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date entered "Attempting (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead entered the 'Attempting' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date entered "Connected (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead entered the 'Connected' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date entered "New (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead entered the 'New' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date entered "Qualified (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead entered the 'Qualified' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date entered "Disqualified (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead entered the 'Disqualified' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date exited "Attempting (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead exited the 'Attempting' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date exited "Connected (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead exited the 'Connected' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date exited "New (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead exited the 'New' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date exited "Qualified (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead exited the 'Qualified' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Date exited "Disqualified (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The date and time when the lead exited the 'Disqualified' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline

Name: Latest time in "Attempting (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The total time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'Attempting' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline since it last entered this stage

Name: Latest time in "Connected (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The total time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'Connected' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline since it last entered this stage

Name: Latest time in "New (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The total time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'New' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline since it last entered this stage

Name: Latest time in "Qualified (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The total time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'Qualified' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline since it last entered this stage

Name: Latest time in "Disqualified (Lead pipeline)"
Description: The total time in seconds spent by the lead in the 'Disqualified' stage, 'Lead pipeline' pipeline since it last entered this stage
